reviews.review: Отвечаю игра норм но читер и античит валв просто во(это была шутка)
Insane game best game ever just sad the anti cheat isnt the best.
The game is really funny and great when you don't meet toxic/loud people who isn't playing the game seriously
Только качества стрельбы не очень а та норм:)

spent 546 hours on this game and the game is still has a high learning curve for a pleb or noobie like me, but holy shit this game is filled with salt filled toxicity brain dead people that cant even communicate with their own parent like they're beating their own meat with a meat mallet for average teenagers people or even adults that dropped out from their college and complain about their grades and can't get a job at a local McDonalds. Thus, making this game filled with some p.o.s that can't even properly speak with some level of respect with teammates other than their own sausage ball sacks with some white stain in their underwear rotting on their skin. Other than that, the anti-cheat system is garbage. FULL ON GARBAGE. It don't even work, even the overwatch system thing is dumb (i mean it does some good) the community can vouch for them by stating that they aren't cheating. Meanwhile, the game is boring. Except for the workshop content, that is fun. As for the competitive side of the game, its horrible. You don't even know what is your ranking progression before you achieve your next rank up or down.


Overall this game is really horrible. Unless you love to torture yourself, then this game is for you. You masochist.
